cherryBlossom

A cherry blossom aka Sakura,

is a flower refer to ornamental cherry trees,

not to be confused with cherry trees that produce fruit for eating.

Yamataka Jindai Sakura, 2.000 years old, oldest Japanese cherry tree!

Yamataka Jindai Sakura, 2.000 years old, oldest Japanese cherry tree!

Yamataka Jindai Sakura, 2.000 years old, oldest Japanese cherry tree!

It is considered the national flower of Japan.
